page.title: 06Tickhill Castle Plans 1985
page.content: {Tickhill Castle}is a{motte}and{bailey} castle.It belongs to The Duchy of Lancaster who is{The Queen.}The Borough Council was going to do the work but it was too expensive but they offered to do some restoration and the Department of Environment might do the rest.DMBC had 24 workers from{Manpower {Services Commission}18 months ago.They chartered all the undergrowth from standing masonry.A team of hardworking archlaeologists have made detailed plans.They have the money for another year's work.The{Castle Open Day}last summer,had 4,000 people attending.Some masonry is still unsafe,to correct it, French lime must be used.Newspapers recently report that the castle may go to members of the Society for the Protections of Buildings.The more support,the more promising it will be.
